sentences.text: STOCKHOLDER PROPOSAL ON SPECIAL SHAREOWNER MEETINGS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management has been advised that John Chevedden, 2215 Nelson Ave., No. 205, Redondo Beach, CA 90278, the owner of at least 25 shares of IBM stock, intends to submit the following proposal at the meeting:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Resolved, Shareowners ask our board to take the steps necessary (unilaterally if possible) to amend our bylaws and each appropriate governing document to give holders in the aggregate of 10% of our outstanding common stock the power to call a special shareowner meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This proposal does not impact our boards current power to call a special meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Delaware law allows 10% of our shares to call a special meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Special meetings allow shareowners to vote on important matters, such as electing new directors that can arise between annual meetings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareowner input on the timing of shareowner meetings is especially important when events unfold quickly and issues may become moot by the next annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This is important because there could be 15-months or more between annual meetings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This proposal is particularly important because our company does not provide for us as shareholders to act by written consent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A majority of Fortune 500 companies provide for shareholders to call special meetings and to act by written consent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We as shareholders need to be empowered especially since the price of our stock has been dead money for the last 5-years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It may be possible to adopt this proposal by incorporating brief text similar to this into our governing documents:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Special meetings of the stockholders, for any purpose or purposes, unless otherwise prescribed by statute, may be called by the Chairman of the Board or the President, and shall be called by the Chairman of the Board or President or Secretary upon the order in writing of a majority of or by resolution of the Board of Directors, or at the request in writing of stockholders owning 10% of the entire capital stock of the Corporation issued and outstanding and entitled to vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please vote to enhance shareholder value:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Special Shareowner Meetings  Proposal 6
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: VOTING RECOMMENDATION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your Board of Directors recommends a vote AGAINST this proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes that the adoption of this proposal is unnecessary because of its existing special meeting by-law provision.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The current provision, which allows stockholders owning at least 25% of IBMs shares to call a special meeting, can be found in Article II, Section 3 of IBMs by-laws at https://www.ibm.com/investor/governance/by-laws.html.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The current 25% threshold is consistent with market practice and already accurately reflects the preference of IBMs stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At IBMs 2010 annual meeting, the same proponent presented this same proposal seeking to lower the 25% threshold to 10%.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At that time, a majority of votes cast voted against lowering the threshold, clearly demonstrating the stockholders support for the 25% threshold.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Lowering the threshold to 10% would allow special interest groups with small minority ownership interests to potentially cause disruption and substantial costs to be incurred by the other 90% of stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Further, a lower threshold is not necessary in light of IBMs history of strong governance policies and practices, including its independent Presiding Director and existing procedures giving stockholders the ability to communicate with the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Therefore, the Board believes that the proponents proposal is counterproductive to IBMs already well-respected corporate governance practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additionally, this same proposal has already been reviewed and rejected by a majority of the votes cast at a prior annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As IBM has an existing by-law permitting stockholders to call special meetings, and this same proposal to lower the threshold failed to receive majority support when last presented, the Board believes that this proposal is unnecessary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: THEREFORE, THE IBM BOARD OF DIRECTORS RECOMMENDS A VOTE AGAINST THIS PROPOSAL.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: STOCKHOLDER PROPOSAL TO ADOPT A PROXY ACCESS BY-LAW
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management has been advised that the Comptroller of the City of New York, One Centre Street, 8th Floor North, New York, NY 10007, on behalf of the New York City Employees Retirement System, the New York City Fire Department Pension Fund, the New York City Teachers Retirement System, the New York City Police Pension Fund and the New York City Board of Education Retirement System, each the beneficial owner of over $2,000 in market value of IBM shares, intends to submit the following proposal at the meeting:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Resolved, Shareholders of International Business Machines Corporation (the Company) ask the board of directors (the Board) to take the steps necessary to adopt a proxy access bylaw.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Such a bylaw shall require the Company to include in proxy materials prepared for a shareholder meeting at which directors are to be elected the name, Disclosure and Statement (as defined herein) of any person nominated for election to the board by a shareholder or group (the Nominator) that meets the criteria established below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company shall allow shareholders to vote on such nominee on the Companys proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The number of shareholder-nominated candidates appearing in proxy materials shall not exceed the larger of two or one quarter of the directors then serving.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This bylaw, which shall supplement existing rights under Company bylaws, should provide that a Nominator must:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: a)        have beneficially owned 3% or more of the Companys outstanding common stock continuously for at least three years before submitting the nomination;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: c)         certify that
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) it will assume liability stemming from any legal or regulatory violation arising out of the Nominators communications with the Company shareholders, including the Disclosure and Statement;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) it will comply with all applicable laws and regulations if it uses soliciting material other than the Companys proxy materials; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) to the best of its knowledge, the required shares were acquired in the ordinary course of business and not to change or influence control at the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominator may submit with the Disclosure a statement not exceeding 500 words in support of each nominee (the Statement).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board shall adopt procedures for promptly resolving disputes over whether notice of a nomination was timely, whether the Disclosure and Statement satisfy the bylaw and applicable federal regulations, and the priority to be given to multiple nominations exceeding the one-quarter limit.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Supporting Statement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe proxy access will make directors more accountable and enhance shareholder value.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A 2014 study by the CFA Institute concluded that proxy access could raise overall US market capitalization by up to $140.3 billion if adopted market-wide, with little cost or disruption.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (http://www.cfapubs.org/doi/pdf/10.2469/ccb.v2014.n9.1)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The proposed terms are similar to those in vacated SEC Rule 14a-11 (https://www.sec.gov/rules/final/2010/33-9136.pdf).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The SEC, following extensive analysis and input from market participants, determined that those terms struck the proper balance of providing shareholders with viable proxy access while containing appropriate safeguards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The proposed terms enjoy strong investor support and company acceptance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Between January 2015 and October 2016, 95 similar shareholder proposals received majority votes and at least 270 companies of various sizes across industries enacted bylaws with similar terms.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We urge shareholders to vote FOR this proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: VOTING RECOMMENDATION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your Board of Directors recommends a vote AGAINST this proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board recommends that you vote against this proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It is the Boards view that IBMs corporate governance policies already ensure that your Board is accountable to stockholders, and that this proposal would undercut the critical role that your Board, the independent Directors, and the Directors and Corporate Governance Committee play in evaluating director nominees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This proposal calls for you to approve a process that would enable special interest groups collectively owning as little as 3% of IBMs outstanding shares to nominate directors that promote their own agendas, potentially at the expense of the long-term interests of stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With independent directors constituting over 90% of the Board and receiving on average more than 95% support over the last five years from you, our stockholders, and IBMs long-standing dedication to stockholder engagement, IBM already has a Board that is accountable to stockholders, responsive to your input, and committed to promoting your best interests.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In that spirit of accountability, we are putting this proposal to the vote of you, our stockholders, rather than unilaterally implementing a by-law change that would fundamentally change the director nomination process.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: IBMs governance policies and track record clearly demonstrate that the Board is accountable to stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For example:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All directors are elected annually, by a majority vote standard in uncontested elections;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders have the power to call special meetings
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders have numerous clearly identified mechanisms to communicate with the Board and the non-management directors, including proposing potential nominees for the Board of Directors; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders may submit proposals for consideration at an Annual Meeting and for inclusion in IBMs Proxy Statement as described in this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Directors and Corporate Governance Committee (the Committee), comprised solely of independent directors, and our Board of Directors are best situated to identify potential director nominees with the experience and qualities to serve on the Board, and to determine whether such candidates will contribute to an effective and well-rounded Board that operates openly and collaboratively and represents the interests of all stockholders, not just those with special interests.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee also carefully reviews and considers the independence of potential nominees, a complex undertaking in light of the broad and expanding scope of IBMs business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Through this process, we believe that the Committee and the Board achieve the optimal balance of identifying and nominating directors that best serve IBM and all its stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This is reflected in the overwhelming support that you, our stockholders, have shown for each of our director nominees year after year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This proxy access proposal would enable a holder or group of holders with as little as 3% of IBMs outstanding shares to place directly into nomination candidates who may fail to meet the independence or other qualifications established by the Board, fail to contribute to the desired mix of perspectives, or fail to represent the interests of stockholders as a whole.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For example, the Board believes that this proposal invites the influence of special interest groups who dont owe fiduciary duties to IBM on decisions that are more appropriately made by the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Were this proposal implemented, a small group of stockholders could nominate directors with a special interest agenda, or a slate of nominees focused on short-term interests rather than creating long-term value for, and promoting the best interests of, all stockholders.

sentences.text: Your Board does not believe this is in the best interests of IBM or you, our stockholders.

sentences.text: The Board believes that its accountability to stockholders and its well-developed system to identify, evaluate and nominate director candidates, makes clear that this proposal is unnecessary.

sentences.text: Further, in the spirit of accountability, rather than unilaterally implementing a proxy access by-law provision, we want to hear from you, our stockholders, on this important topic.

sentences.text: FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is a stockholder of record?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A stockholder of record or registered stockholder (record owner) is a stockholder whose ownership of IBM stock is reflected directly on the books and records of our transfer agent, Computershare Trust Company, N.A. If you hold IBM stock through a bank, broker or other intermediary, you are not a stockholder of record.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Instead, you hold your stock in street name, and the record owner of your shares is usually your bank, broker or other intermediary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are not a registered stockholder, please understand that IBM does not know that you are a stockholder, or how many shares you own.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: I want to attend the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What procedures must I follow?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Admission to the Annual Meeting will be on a first-come, first-served basis, and an admission ticket and picture identification will be required to enter the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any individual arriving without an admission ticket will not be admitted to the meeting unless it can be verified that the individual is an IBM stockholder as of the record date for the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For stockholders of record that received a Proxy Statement by mail: An admission ticket is attached to the proxy card sent with this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For stockholders of record that received a Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials: Please follow the instructions provided on the Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials to request an admission ticket.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For holders in street name: Stockholders holding IBM stock in bank or brokerage accounts can obtain an admission ticket in advance by sending a written request, along with proof of stock ownership (such as a brokerage statement) to our transfer agent, Computershare Trust Company, N.A., P.O. Box 43078, Providence, RI 02940-3078.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you hold your shares in street name and you wish to vote those shares at the meeting, you must also request a legal proxy directly from your bank, broker or other intermediary well in advance of the meeting and bring it to the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Contact your bank, broker or other intermediary for specific information on how to obtain a
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: legal proxy in order to attend and vote your shares at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Are there specific restrictions on attending the Annual Meeting, and what I can bring with me into the meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This is a meeting for stockholders, and security at the meeting is very important.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You will be asked to walk through an electronic screening device before entering the meeting hall.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, cameras, cell phones, recording equipment and other electronic devices will not be permitted to be brought into the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is the record date for the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: February 24, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Which IBM shares will be entitled to vote at the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: IBMs common stock ($0.20 par value capital stock) is the only class of security entitled to vote at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each stockholder of record and each stockholder who holds stock in street name at the close of business as of the record date is entitled to one vote for each share held at the meeting, or any adjournment or postponement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Which IBM shares are included in the proxy card?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For stockholders of record: The proxy card covers the number of shares to be voted in your account as of the record date, including any shares held for participants in the IBM Investor Services Program and Employees Stock Purchase Plans.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For stockholders who are participants in the IBM Stock Fund investment alternative under the IBM 401(k) Plus Plan: The card serves as a voting instruction to the Trustee of the plan for IBM shares held in the IBM Stock Fund as of the record date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For holders in street name: You will receive a voting instruction form directly from your bank, broker or other intermediary containing instructions on how you can direct your record holder to vote your shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Contact your bank, broker or other intermediary if you have any questions regarding your IBM stock holdings as of the record date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: May I vote my shares in person at the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For stockholders of record: Yes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, we encourage you to vote by proxy card, the Internet or by telephone even if you plan to attend the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you wish to give a proxy to someone other than the individuals named as proxies on the proxy card, you may replace the names appearing on the proxy card, with the name of some other person, sign the card and give the proxy card to that person for use at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For holders in street name: Yes, but in order to do so you will first have to ask your bank, broker or other intermediary to furnish you with a legal proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You will need to bring the legal proxy with you to the meeting, and hand it in with a signed ballot that you can request at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You will not be able to vote your shares at the meeting without a legal proxy and a signed ballot.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Can I vote my shares without attending the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Yes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Whether or not you attend the meeting, we encourage you to vote your shares promptly.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For stockholders of record: Your shares cannot be voted unless a signed proxy card is returned, shares are voted using the Internet or the telephone, or other specific arrangements are made to have your shares represented at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You are encouraged to specify your choices by checking the appropriate boxes on the proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares will be voted following your written instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However it is not necessary to check any boxes if you wish to vote in accordance with the Board of Directors recommendations; in that case, merely sign, date and return the proxy card in the enclosed envelope, or if you received notice of Internet availability of proxy materials, follow the instructions on how to access the proxy materials and vote online.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You can also vote your shares over the Internet, or by calling a designated telephone number.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These Internet and telephone voting procedures are designed to authenticate your identity in order to allow you to provide your voting instructions, and to confirm that your instructions have been recorded properly.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The procedures which have been put in place are consistent with the requirements of applicable law.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Specific instructions for stockholders of record who wish to use the Internet or telephone voting procedures are set forth on the proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For participants in the IBM Stock Fund investment alternative under the IBM 401(k) Plus Plan: In order to have the Trustee vote your shares as you direct, you must timely furnish your voting instructions over the Internet or by telephone by 12:01 a.m.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: EDT on April 24, 2017, or otherwise ensure that your card is signed, returned and received by such time and date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If instructions are not received over the Internet or by telephone by 12:01 a.m.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: EDT on April 24, 2017, or if the signed card is not returned and received by such time and date, the IBM shares in the IBM Stock Fund under the IBM 401(k) Plus Plan will be voted by the Trustee in proportion to the shares for which the Trustee timely receives voting instructions, provided the Trustee determines such vote is consistent with its fiduciary duties under the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974, as amended.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For holders in street name: You must timely deliver your voting instructions to your respective bank, broker or other intermediary, following the specific instructions that have been provided to you by your bank, broker or other intermediary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: May I change or revoke my proxy?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For stockholders of record: Yes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A proxy may be revoked at any time prior to the voting at the meeting by submitting a later dated proxy (including a proxy via the Internet or by telephone) or by giving timely written notice of revocation to the Secretary of IBM.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For holders in street name: Yes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You must follow the specific voting directions provided to you by your bank, broker or other intermediary to change or revoke any instructions you have already provided to your bank, broker or other intermediary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How can I contact IBMs transfer agent?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Contact our transfer agent either by writing Computershare Trust Company, N.A., P.O. Box 43078, Providence, RI 02940-3078, or by telephoning 888-IBM-6700 (outside the United States, Canada and Puerto Rico 781-575-2727).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Other than the items in the proxy statement, what other items of business will be addressed at the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management knows of no other matters that may be properly presented at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If other proper matters are introduced at the meeting, the individuals named as proxies on the proxy card are also authorized to vote upon those matters utilizing their own discretion.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During the question period at the Annual Meeting, what topics will be discussed?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This part of the meeting is for stockholders to ask questions to the Chairman about company matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It is not the appropriate forum to raise personal grievances.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: I understand that a quorum of stockholders is required in order for IBM to transact business at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What constitutes a quorum?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A majority of all outstanding shares of common stock having voting power, in person or represented by proxy and entitled to vote, constitutes a quorum for the transaction of business at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How many shares of IBM stock are outstanding?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As of February 10, 2017, there were 943,212,551 shares of common stock outstanding and entitled to be voted.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is the voting requirement for electing IBMs directors?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To be elected in an uncontested election, each director must receive a majority of the votes cast.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In a contested election, a nominee receiving a plurality of the votes cast at such election shall be elected.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is broker discretionary voting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This refers to the NYSE rule allowing brokers to vote their customers shares on certain routine matters in the Proxy Statement at the brokers discretion when they have not received timely voting instructions from their customers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The NYSE rules on broker discretionary voting prohibit banks, brokers and other intermediaries from voting uninstructed shares on certain matters, including the election of directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Therefore, if you hold your stock in street name and you do not instruct your bank, broker or other intermediary
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: how to vote in the election of directors, no votes will be cast on your behalf.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It is important that you cast your vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Are abstentions and broker non-votes counted as votes cast?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the laws of New York State, IBMs state of incorporation, votes cast at a meeting of stockholders by the holders of shares entitled to vote are determinative of the outcome of the matter subject to vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions and broker non-votes will not be considered votes cast based on current New York State law requirements and IBMs certificate of incorporation and by-laws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Assuming there is a proper quorum of shares represented at the meeting, how many shares are required to approve the proposals being voted upon in this proxy statement?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The table below reflects the vote required in accordance with the laws of New York State:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Do abstentions Is broker   count as discretionary   Proposal Vote required votes cast?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: voting allowed?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Election of Directors Majority of votes cast No No Ratification of Appointment of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP Majority of votes cast No Yes Management Proposal on Advisory Vote on Executive Compensation* Majority of votes cast No No Frequency of Advisory Vote on Executive Compensation* Majority of votes cast No No Stockholder Proposals* Majority of votes cast No No
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: *Advisory and non-binding
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who tabulates the votes?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Votes are counted by employees of Computershare Trust Company, N.A., IBMs transfer agent and registrar, and certified by the Inspectors of Election (who are employees of IVS Associates, Inc.).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Where can I find the voting results of the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: IBM intends to announce the preliminary voting results at the Annual Meeting and publish the final results on our website.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, IBM will report voting results on a Form 8-K shortly after the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Will my votes be confidential?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Yes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All stockholder meeting proxies, ballots and tabulations that identify individual stockholders are kept confidential and are not available for examination.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the identity or the vote of any stockholder is not disclosed except as required by law.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How do I submit a proposal for inclusion in IBMs 2018 proxy material?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholder proposals may be submitted for IBMs 2018 proxy material after the 2017 Annual Meeting and must be received at our corporate headquarters no later than November 13, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposals should be sent via registered, certified or express mail to: Office of the Secretary, International Business Machines Corporation, 1 New Orchard Road, Mail Drop 301, Armonk, NY 10504.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management carefully considers all proposals and suggestions from stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When adoption is clearly in the best interest of IBM and stockholders, and can be accomplished without stockholder approval, the proposal is implemented without inclusion in the Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Examples of stockholder proposals and suggestions that have been adopted over the years include stockholder ratification of the appointment of an independent registered public accounting firm, improved procedures involving dividend checks and stockholder publications, and changes or additions to the proxy materials concerning matters like abstentions from voting, appointment of alternative proxy, inclusion of a table of contents, proponent disclosure and secrecy of stockholder voting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How do I submit an item of business for the 2018 Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders who intend to present an item of business at the 2018 Annual Meeting of Stockholders (other than a proposal submitted for inclusion in IBMs Proxy Statement) must provide notice of such business to IBMs Secretary no earlier than October 14, 2017 and no later than November 13, 2017 as set forth more fully in IBMs by-laws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: I did not receive a copy of the Annual Report.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How can I get one?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders of record who did not receive an IBM Annual Report or who previously elected not to receive one for a specific account may request that IBM mail its Annual Report to that account by writing to our transfer agent, Computershare Trust Company, N.A. (address and phone number in Question 10 above).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are not a stockholder of record and did not receive an Annual Report from your bank, broker or other intermediary, you must contact your bank, broker or other intermediary directly.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is householding and does IBM do this?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Householding is a procedure approved by the SEC under which stockholders who have the same address and last name and do not participate in electronic delivery of proxy materials will receive only one copy of a companys proxy statement and annual report from a company, bank, broker or other intermediary, unless one or more of these stockholders notifies the company, bank, broker or other intermediary that they wish to continue to receive individual copies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the present time, IBM does not household for any of our stockholders of record.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, as explained below, your bank, broker or other intermediary may be householding your account if you hold your shares in street name.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If I am a holder in street name, how may I obtain a separate set of proxy materials?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you hold shares in street name, your bank, broker or other intermediary may be delivering only one copy of our Proxy Statement and the IBM Annual Report to multiple stockholders of the same household who share the same address, and may continue to do so, unless your bank, broker or other intermediary has received contrary instructions from one or more of the affected stockholders in the household.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are such a beneficial holder, contact your bank, broker or other intermediary directly in order to receive a separate set of our proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Members of our household own IBM shares through a number of different brokerage firms.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Will we continue to receive multiple sets of materials?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Yes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you and others sharing a single address hold IBM shares through multiple brokers, you will continue to receive at least one set of proxy materials from each broker.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: I received a notice of Internet availability of proxy materials, what does this mean?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Consistent with common practice and in accordance with SEC rules, IBM is distributing proxy materials to some stockholders over the Internet by sending a Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials that explains how to access our proxy materials and vote online.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you received a notice and would like a printed copy of the proxy materials (including the Annual Report, Proxy Statement and a proxy card, in the case of stockholders of record, or a voting instruction form in the case of stockholders holding shares in street name), please follow the instructions included in your notice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: I received my proxy materials in hard copy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How may I arrange to receive them electronically?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To enroll for electronic delivery, go to our Investor Relations website at http://www.ibm.com/investor/ and select Stockholder services, scroll down to Consent for materials online, click on either if you own stock directly in your name or if you own stock beneficially through a brokerage account, and follow the instructions to enroll.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: I previously consented to receive electronic delivery of my proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Can you send me a hard copy of these proxy materials?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For stockholders of record: We will deliver promptly, upon written or oral request, a separate copy of these proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Contact our transfer agent, Computershare Trust Company, N.A. (address and phone number in Question 10 above).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For holders in street name: You must contact your bank, broker or other intermediary to receive copies of these materia
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who is making this proxy solicitation and approximately how much will these solicitation activities cost?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Solicitation of proxies is being made by IBM through the mail, in person and by telecommunications.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The cost of this solicitation will be borne by IBM.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, management has retained Morrow Sodali LLC to assist in soliciting proxies for a fee of approximately $45,000, plus reasonable out-of-pocket expenses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Christina M. Montgomery Vice President and Secretary March 13, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: APPENDIX A  NON-GAAP FINANCIAL INFORMATION AND RECONCILIATIONS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The rationale for managements use of non-GAAP information in the Compensation Discussion and Analysis and Proxy Statement is as follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Operating (non-GAAP) Earnings Per Share and Related Income Statement Items
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In an effort to provide better transparency into the operational results of the business, IBM separates business results into operating and non-operating categories.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Operating earnings from continuing operations is a non-GAAP measure that excludes the effects of certain acquisition-related charges, retirement-related costs, discontinued operations and their related tax impacts.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For acquisitions, operating earnings exclude the amortization of purchased intangible assets and acquisition-related charges such as in-process research, development, transaction costs, applicable restructuring, and related expenses and tax charges related to acquisition integration.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These charges are excluded, as they may be inconsistent in amount and timing from period to period and are dependent on the size, type and frequency of IBMs acquisitions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For retirement-related costs, IBM characterizes certain items as operating and others as non- operating.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: IBM includes defined benefit plan and nonpension postretirement benefit plan service cost, amortization of prior service cost and the cost of defined contribution plans in operating earnings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Non-operating retirement-related cost includes defined benefit plan and nonpension postretirement benefit plan interest cost, expected return on plan assets, amortized actuarial gains/losses, the impacts of any plan curtailments/settlements and multi-employer plan costs, pension insolvency costs and other costs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Non-operating retirement-related costs are primarily related to changes in pension plan assets and liabilities, which are tied to financial market performance, and IBM considers these costs to be outside of the operational performance of the business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Overall, IBM believes that providing investors with a view of operating earnings as described above provides increased transparency and clarity into both the operational results of the business and the performance of IBMs pension plans; improves visibility to management decisions and their impacts on operational performance; enables better comparison to peer companies; and allows IBM to provide a long-term strategic view of the business going forward.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: IBMs reportable segment financial results reflect operating earnings from continuing operations, consistent with IBMs management and measurement system.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Free Cash Flow
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: IBM uses free cash flow as a measure to evaluate its operating results, plan share repurchase levels, strategic investments and assess its ability and need to incur and service debt.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The entire free cash flow amount is not necessarily available for discretionary expenditures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: IBM defines free cash flow as net cash from operating activities less the change in Global Financing receivables and net capital expenditures, including the investment in software.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A key objective of the Global Financing business is to generate strong returns on
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: equity, and increasing receivables is the basis for growth.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, management considers Global Financing receivables as a profit-generating investment, not as working capital that should be minimized for efficiency.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Therefore, management includes presentations of both free cash flow and net cash from operating activities that exclude the effect of Global Financing receivables.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Free cash flow guidance is derived using an estimate of profit, working capital and operational cash outflows.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As previously noted, IBM views Global Financing receivables as a profit-generating investment, which it seeks to maximize, and therefore it is not considered when formulating guidance for free cash flow.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a result, IBM does not estimate a GAAP Net Cash from Operations expectation metric.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Constant Currency
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When IBM refers to growth rates at constant currency or adjusts such growth rates for currency, it is done so that certain financial results can be viewed without the impact of fluctuations in foreign currency exchange rates, thereby facilitating period-to-period comparisons of its business performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Financial results adjusted for currency are calculated by translating current period activity in local currency using the comparable prior year periods currency conversion rate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This approach is used for countries where the functional currency is the local currency.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Generally, when the dollar either strengthens or weakens against other currencies, the growth at constant currency rates or adjusting for currency will be higher or lower than growth reported at actual exchange rates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN
